entry.title: RT wyc.eth: 1/ Sign-In with Ethereum @signinwitheth is the first step to Unbundle The Login. Today, identity providers such as Google, Facebook, or Ap...
entry.summary: RT wyc.eth 1/ Sign-In with Ethereum @signinwitheth is the first step to Unbundle The Login. Today, identity providers such as Google, Facebook, or Apple manage the entire login experience, but so much more can be unlocked by unbundling: user control, data sharing, and faster innovation.

entry.summary: RT erictang.eth Speculation has always come ahead of sustained innovation. Web3 takes it to a whole new level because of the inherit transparency. The leading indicator of innovation is the web3 brain drain in SV, academia, and wall st.

entry.title: RT Paola: LATAM is a leader in crypto ownership among women with 43% of crypto owners in the region. The trend is expected to continue with the crypto...
entry.summary: RT Paola LATAM is a leader in crypto ownership among women with 43% of crypto owners in the region. The trend is expected to continue with the crypto-curious audience. Among those likely to purchase crypto in the next year in Latin America, more than half (54%) are women. #wagmi 💛🙌
